product_name: GIGABYTE Z590 AORUS PRO AX Motherboard
slots: 3 x PCIe x16, 2 x PCIe x1
description: The GIGABYTE Z590 AORUS PRO AX is a high-performance motherboard for Intel processors. It supports up to 128GB of DDR4 memory and offers ample storage with multiple M.2 and SATA options. With USB 3.2 Gen 2 and USB-C ports, it ensures fast data transfer. It features WiFi 6E and 2.5G LAN for high-speed networking.

slots: 1 x PCIe x16, 1 x PCIe x4, 2 x PCIe x1
description: The GIGABYTE B550 AORUS ELITE is a reliable motherboard for AMD processors. It supports up to 128GB of DDR4 memory and provides both M.2 and SATA storage options. With USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports, it offers fast data transfer. Equipped with 1G LAN, it ensures stable wired networking.

product_name: GIGABYTE H410M S2H Micro ATX Motherboard
slots: 1 x PCIe x16, 2 x PCIe x1
description: The GIGABYTE H410M S2H is a compact Micro ATX motherboard for Intel processors. It supports up to 64GB of DDR4 memory and offers M.2 and SATA storage options. With USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports, it provides decent data speeds. Equipped with 1G LAN, it ensures reliable wired connections.
